uploadUserAvatar

          },
        },
      },
    },

      description: 'No file or invalid image',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {

            type: 'object',

            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },

      description: 'User not found',
